1065462343222550528.text:
Don’t be trolled by this. Nothing to see here. Let’s just get on and do what we know we gotta do for the planet. 
  Happy Thanksgiving! https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1065400254151954432 …

1065462857393938432.text: Can I keep “He’s a fucking idiot” on loop in my head while I get on with things?

1065652124523073536.text: That's why he won't call it Climate Change.

1065818236992872448.text: Luckily most continue their emissions standards regardless of the Don's withdrawal. There's a sane contingent that won't let him screw everyone out of the planet without a fight. And those who do will be exposed. Justice eventually catches up to corruption regardless of legality.

1065469436369530880.text: Are you talking about murder?  Because it sounds like you're talking about murder.

1065464055891025920.text: Sure. But it’s an energy suck.

1065822067210289153.text: I didn't realize you were such an optimist.

1065464490186207232.text: I think of it as a mantra.

1065828684806987776.text: Enough are being reasonable on climate change I believe.  Not to say something else won't do us in.
